### TABLEDATA

CREATE TABLE StudentAttendance (
    student_id INT,
    class_id INT,
    is_present BOOLEAN,
    attendance_date DATE
);

### STATEMENT

UPDATE StudentAttendance SET is_present = TRUE WHERE student_id = 1 AND class_id = 101
